ShamelaGPT is built upon the vast and trusted library of Shamela.ws, bringing authentic Islamic knowledge closer to everyone.

Our mission is to make reliable, reference-based information accessible in a natural and conversational way — across languages, backgrounds, and levels of understanding.

Whether you seek deeper insight, quick clarifications, or evidence-backed answers to common misconceptions, ShamelaGPT helps you explore Islam's rich heritage with accuracy, respect, and ease.

"Seek knowledge from the cradle to the grave." — Let this be your companion on that journey.
Sign In for a Better Experience

Log in to save your conversations, revisit your past questions, and share meaningful discussions with others.

Creating an account also helps us improve your learning experience — personalizing insights, language preferences, and reference trails for you.

ShamelaGPT is an AI-powered Islamic knowledge assistant built upon the vast and trusted library of Shamela.ws. Our mission is to make reliable, reference-based Islamic knowledge accessible to everyone in a natural and conversational way.\n\nWe combine cutting-edge AI technology with authentic Islamic sources to provide accurate answers, backed by proper references from classical and contemporary Islamic scholarship.
To provide reliable, AI-powered access to authentic Islamic knowledge for research, education, and fact-checking—without replacing scholarship or religious authority.
Support students, researchers, educators, and developers
Combat misinformation and misrepresentation of Islam online
Enable ethical AI use in Islamic knowledge systems
Preserve trust by prioritizing sources, citations, and context
Authentic Islamic sources are the foundation of AI-driven knowledge tools
Islamic information online is verifiable, contextual, and responsibly delivered
Underrepresented languages and communities gain equal access to trusted knowledge
Children and new reverts receive age-appropriate, compassionate explanations
Developers and institutions can build on open, auditable knowledge infrastructure
ShamelaGPT was created to help close this gap by offering AI tools grounded in authentic sources, with transparency, traceability, and context at the core.
All responses are generated using the comprehensive library of Shamela.ws, one of the most trusted and extensive digital Islamic libraries available today.

Messages, voice input, and images you choose for OCR are sent securely to our servers to generate answers. Conversations are stored locally and can be deleted from History; you can delete your account (and server-side data) in Settings.
ShamelaGPT is built and maintained by Neural Lines, a team focused on responsible AI products grounded in authentic sources.
